title: Fire breaks out in AC unit : When can this happen , what precautions should be taken ?
body_text:
Fire breaks out in AC unit: When can this happen, what precautions should be taken?
Fires caused by air conditioners are a common occurrence in the summer season in India due to overheating and short-circuiting. These incidents can be prevented by ensuring proper wiring connections, regular maintenance, and avoiding placing objects near the outdoor unit. The use of authorised repair centers and turning off the main power switch when not in use can also help.
